A '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn |- | Magnemite || | Chinchou || Electrike |- | Pikachu || | Mareep || Plusle |- | Voltorb || | Elekid || Minun |- | Electabuzz || | || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Vermillion City || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}
